Number of posts:

Closing date:

Further Information

Darlington Borough Council are looking to appoint a Head of SEND & Inclusion to lead the range of services delivered across the Borough to support our most vulnerable children.

For this brand new role, we're looking for an innovative leader with an outstanding record in delivering support services to vulnerable children with SEND, or other additional learning, social, medical or mental health needs, to ensure they achieve the best possible educational and life outcomes.

Reporting to the Head of Education and Inclusion you will work to ensure we fulfil all of our statutory responsibilities whilst engaging effectively with children, families and our partners to design services that effectively meet their needs.

You will have relevant and extensive experience of leading on SEND in a school or Local Authority senior leadership role.

You will be able to provide strategic leadership for SEND & Inclusion issues across Darlington, working collaboratively with internal and external partners to deliver the best possible services to children and young people in the area.

For detailed information on this role, please refer to the Job Description and Person Specification.

For a further informal discussion, please contact Tony Murphy, Head of Education and Inclusion, on 01325 405367
